scripts.docker:build_app: docker build ./src/api -t asapp-qa-challenge-api && docker build ./src/ui -t asapp-qa-challenge-ui && docker-compose up -d
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:tests: npm run mochawesome:delete & npx cypress run & npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.app:build_and_test: npm run docker:build_app && timeout /t 10 && npm run cypress:tests
